name: Funny Yo 3
detailed_description:
Funny Yo 3


This game is a continuation of the adventures of a Funny girl named Yo.

You will again have a long journey to dreamland with its many levels with beautiful surroundings. To get rid of enemies just jump on their heads. The game has a few power-ups - shooter, invulnerability, life, etc. You can also find secret bonus levels in which you will have to collect coins or earn them by carrying out special assignments. Play as long as you want. Many bosses will challenge you along the way. Good luck!

Controls
A - Move left.
D - Move right.
W - Jump.
K - Shoot

FEATURES :


- Stylized cartoonish graphics.
- Fantastic adventure.
- 2D Side-scrolling Platformer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
